title: Titans QB Ward scuffles with DT Simmons in camp
content: Titans rookie QB Cam Ward got into a scuffle with defensive lineman Jeffrey Simmons as the two exchanged shoves.

title: Ohio State names Sayin starting QB vs. Texas
content: Ohio State has named second-year player Julian Sayin as its starting quarterback for its season opener against No. 1 Texas at Ohio Stadium.

title: Wolf: Pats willing to trade a top pick to help team
content: Patriots executive Eliot Wolf said Monday that the team is open for business if a significant trade opportunity presents itself and indicated he'd be willing to trade a first- or second-round draft pick.

title: Phils' Wheeler undergoes surgery; timeline unclear
content: Philadelphia Phillies ace Zack Wheeler had surgery Monday to remove a blood clot in his upper right arm, and the team says a timeline for his recovery remains uncertain.

title: Browns name veteran QB Flacco Week 1 starter
content: Joe Flacco will open the season as the Cleveland Browns' starting quarterback, the team announced Monday.

title: Texas, Penn St. lead AP preseason All-Americans
content: Texas edge rusher Colin Simmons is among three Longhorns on The Associated Press All-America team. No. 2 Penn State also had three players, giving the Nittany Lions and Longhorns the most on the team.

title: Commanders' Robinson to sit amid uncertainty
content: Commanders running back Brian Robinson Jr. will not play in Monday night's preseason game against the Bengals, possibly signaling the end of his tenure with the franchise.

title: Rams' Stafford practices but situation still 'fluid'
content: Rams quarterback Matthew Stafford practiced Monday with the team for the first time in training camp.

title: üèà Fantasy football: Our brand new mock draft
content: Peak draft season is almost here. Our crew provides a good practice run through a 12-teamer to help you prepare for the real thing.

title: Barnwell picks five NFL teams set to improve: Who could go from worst to first?
content: Which teams will win more this season? We made five picks based on offseason additions, fumble luck and more.

title: Answering the biggest questions facing Keegan Bradley with six U.S. Ryder Cup spots left
content: Will Bradley choose himself to play at ? Who are locks to make the team? We answer some of the biggest questions with six captain's picks left to fill out the team.

title: 'You felt the momentum change': Michael Vick's early impact at Norfolk State
content: Vick is coaching just 30 miles from where he grew up, and in the state where he electrified college football as a player.

title: Irish Farmageddon, a new option team and ... UTEP?! Your guide to CFB fun in 2025
content: The biggest games, wildest races, must-see players and small-school mayhem. Bill Connelly is here for it all.

title: What Browns naming Joe Flacco QB1 means for Shedeur Sanders, Dillon Gabriel
content: The questions surrounding the Browns' Week 1 starter are answered, but the clock to begin finding the long-term solution continues to run.

title: Solak: Everything I learned at 10 different NFL training camp stops
content: After visits with 10 NFL teams in eight states, Ben Solak compiled the best things he heard -- and saw -- throughout the trip.

title: 'We know how to weather storms': How the Aces saved their WNBA season
content: Las Vegas, .500 at the All-Star break, has won seven straight and is vying to host early WNBA playoff games.

title: The stat that could swing every NBA team's 2025-26 season
content: What numbers are teams focused on with just over a month until camp? Zach Kram runs down the big stat for all 30 franchises.

title: A quest to understand the Carlos Alcaraz/Emma Raducanu ship
content: Carlos Alcaraz and Emma Raducanu say they're just friends. But a growing group of their fans is rooting for far more than just a US Open mixed doubles title. Welcome to the world of tennis shippers.

title: Barcelona's hot start, Bayern win Supercup, more from the weekend
content: We're back for the 2025-26 and Gab Marcotti has a lot to unpack from opening weekend! From Arsenal's win over Man United to Barcelona's hot start, let's recap the weekend.

title: The VAR Review: Explaining Eze's disallowed goal, and why Senesi escaped a red card
content: Looking at Eberechi Eze's disallowed free kick for Crystal Palace at Chelsea, and Marcos Senesi's possible red card against Liverpool.

title: Messi's return helps Miami's surge
content: Lionel Messi's return is a huge boost for Inter Miami as they look to take the top spot in the latest ESPN Power Rankings.

title: How clubs are using loyalty against unhappy or unwanted stars
content: Loyalty is a virtue, but in football business comes first. Isak is now walking the rocky path previously taken by stars like Alexander-Arnold and Kane.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Man United braced for Chelsea's opening Garnacho bid
content: Manchester United will hold firm on their valuation of Chelsea target Alejandro Garnacho. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Inside the hidden costs of football: '88 Saints speak out
content: Nearly 40 years after their time in the NFL, the players from the 1988 New Orleans Saints grapple with the physical toll of football while honoring a bond forged through the toughest game.

title: Texans and Eagles trading previously dealt picks back to each other? Who won the Bryant-Metchie trade?
content: Who won the recent Texans-Eagles trade? What about the Jalen Ramsey-Minkah Fitzpatrick swap? We sized up the offseason's trades.

title: ü§î Find out where you score in our Sports Misery Index.
content: Whether there's confetti falling from your team's last title or you're still waiting to see your first, you probably have an idea of how satisfied - or miserable - you are as a fan. But could you put a number on it?

title: üéµ Taylor Swift joins Kelce brothers on 'New Heights'
content: The superstar debuted on Jason and Travis Kelce's "New Heights" podcast, talked about becoming a football fan -- and even caught Caitlin Clark's attention.

title: üìà NFL Future Power Rankings
content: We ranked all 32 NFL franchises' expectations for 2025 through 2027. Which teams are set up to thrive in the future?

title: üèà Predicting best, worst scenarios for NFL teams
content: We simulated best-case and worst-case scenarios for every team, and our NFL reporters picked the biggest variables.

title: Venus Williams is back at the US Open -- eyeing one title not on her long list
content: Two-time former US Open champion Venus Williams will play again this week. And she still has one major career goal.

title: Zelensky Says "Best" Conversation Yet With Trump At White House
content: Ukrainian President Volodmyr Zelensky on Monday gave an upbeat asessment of talks with US counterpart Donald Trump and said they discussed security guarantees.

title: Video: Car Evades Them, Cops Follow It For 30 Minutes In Movie-Style Chase
content: Police attempted to stop a hatchback suspected to be carrying drugs at a toll plaza in Punjab, but the driver accelerated instead. What followed was a 30-minute chase through the streets and narrow lanes of the town of Bagha Purana in Moga district.

title: Row Over No Mention Of Kuki Militants In Answer Choices On Manipur Crisis, Assam Panel Points At Question Setters
content: The Assam Public Service Commission (APSC) has on its part denied any mala fide intent in including a controversial question on the Manipur violence in a paper for selecting agricultural development officer.

title: "Reasonable Chance Of Ending War": Trump Meets Zelensky At White House
content: Days after he met Russian President Vladimir Putin in Alaska, US President Donald Trump welcomed his Ukrainian counterpart Volodymyr Zelensky to the White House to discuss a path for the resolution of the conflict between the two countries.

title: "Those Left Out Can Submit Aadhaar To Include Their Name": Poll Body On Bihar Draft Roll
content: The Election Commission said people who have been left out of Bihar's draft voter list can submit a copy of their Aadhaar to include their name in the electoral roll, after the Supreme Court directed the poll authority to accept the card as ID proof

title: Trump Once Again Claims He Stopped India, Pak War
content: US President Donald Trump on Monday once again repeated his claim that he stopped the war between India and Pakistan.

title: India Bloc Meets To Discuss Opposition's Joint Vice President Candidate
content: The INDIA bloc is holding a meet to finalise the Opposition candidate for the Vice President post -- the election is on September 9.

title: Old US Spy Satellite Images To Guide New Blueprint For Ganga Revival
content: The Uttar Pradesh government announced on Monday that, in a historic initiative to chart a course for the Ganga River's future through its past, the National Mission for Clean Ganga (NMCG) had launched a major project led by IIT Kanpur.

title: BJP MLA Demands UP's Ghazipur Be Named After Seer Parashuram's Son
content: BJP MLA from Bansdih Assembly constituency, Ketki Singh, on Monday urged the Centre and the state government to rename Ghazipur after Maharishi Gautam, the father of Maharishi Parashuram.

title: 13-Year-Old Girl 'Kidnapped, Forcibly Married, Raped' In Delhi; 4 Arrested
content: A 13-year-old girl was allegedly trafficked, married off in Uttar Pradesh for monetary benefits and raped after she left home in Delhi's Bharat Nagar following a dispute with her father nearly a month ago, an official said on Monday.

title: PM Modi Chairs High-level Meet With Ministers On Next-Generation Reforms
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday chaired a high-level meeting, which included top Union ministers, secretaries and economists, to deliberate on the roadmap for the next generation reforms.

title: Haryana Rights Panel Cites Shakespeare After Aadhaar Record Shows Living Man Dead
content: The HHRC has taken suo-motu cognizance of a media report highlighting an incident where a serving employee of the Public Health Department was allegedly denied his salary in the post-COVID period because his Aadhaar record shows him as "deceased".

title: US, Bangladesh, UK Lead Tourist Arrivals In India Over Last 5 Years: Data
content: The US, Bangladesh, the UK, Australia and Canada were the top five source countries for Foreign Tourist Arrivals (FTAs) in India in the last five years, according to data shared by the government.

title: "Studied In Government School, Played On Streets": Friend Of BJP's Vice President Pick
content: Tirupur, Tamil Nadu's bustling textile town, is celebrating one of its own. With the NDA naming Maharashtra Governor CP Radhakrishnan as its Vice Presidential candidate, his alma mater and old neighbourhoods were abuzz with pride and emotion.

title: 4.3 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Parts Of Assam
content: An earthquake of 4.3 magnitude hit Assam's Nagaon on Monday, making it the seventh quake in the state this month and the third in the district, an official said.

title: Kerala Rapper Hirandas Murali Faces Fresh Allegations Of Sexual Harassment Amid Ongoing Rape Case
content: Fresh trouble has emerged for rapper Hirandas Murali, popularly known as Vedan, who is already facing a rape allegation, after two more women sent complaints to the Kerala Chief Minister alleging sexual advances made by him in 2020.

title: "Is This A Joke": 3,000 Bighas Of Land For Cement Firm Outrages High Court
content: A video of a court proceeding of Gauhati High Court that was live streamed, has gone viral on social media where the court is heard raising concern over the allotment of nearly 3,000 bighas of land in Assam's Dima Hasao district to a cement company.

title: 52 Killed By Islamic State-Backed Rebels Armed With Machetes In Congo
content: Islamic State-backed rebels armed with machetes and hoes have killed at least 52 civilians in the Beni and Lubero areas of eastern Democratic Republic of Congo in recent days, UN and local officials said.

title: 3.9 Magnitude Earthquake Hits Kangra In Himachal Pradesh
content: Tremors were felt in parts of Himachal Pradesh's Kangra district after an earthquake of 3.9 intensity struck near Dharamshala town on Monday evening at 9.28 pm.

title: Video: Thane Locals Swim Through Flooded Underpass To Save Stranded Car Passengers
content: Stuck in the middle of a flooded underpass inside their almost submerged car, two people in Maharashtra's Thane district were rescued by locals.

title: Eye on meeting‚Äôs outcome: Zelenskyy gets dressing down before talks; Trump vows 'lasting peace'
content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy met with US President Donald Trump and European leaders at the White House on Monday, opting for a black jacket instead of a formal suit. This contrasted with his pre-invasion attire of tailored suits, as since 2022, he has favored more casual, military-style clothing, including vyshyvanka.

title: VP election: DMK in bind as TN parties pitch for 'son of the soil' Radhakrishnan
content: The NDA's choice of C P Radhakrishnan for vice-president has placed DMK in a dilemma. While rejecting a Tamil Nadu native could be seen as disrespecting Tamil pride, supporting a BJP candidate clashes with DMK's stance against the Centre. AIADMK and BJP leaders are urging DMK to support Radhakrishnan, emphasizing the opportunity for a Tamilian to hold high office.

title: Mass layoffs: CEO laid off 80% employees two years ago; now says that he‚Ä¶.
content: IgniteTech CEO Eric Vaughan replaced nearly 80% of his workforce in 2023 due to resistance to the company's AI adoption mandate. Despite employee sabotage and refusal to participate, the transformation led to substantial returns, including the launch of two AI solutions and high profit margins. Vaughan doesn't recommend this strategy, citing cultural resistance as the cause.

title: Rajnath reaches out to DMK, TMC, BJD for consensus on VP nominee
content: Defence Minister Rajnath Singh is actively seeking support for NDA's Vice-Presidential candidate, C P Radhakrishnan, by reaching out to key political figures like M K Stalin and Naveen Patnaik. Devendra Fadnavis has appealed to Maharashtra's regional parties, including Shiv Sena (UBT) and NCP, to support Radhakrishnan, highlighting his connection to the state as a voter.

title: 'Hero' of Chasoti: Ambulance driver saves more than 60 pilgrims in Kishtwar flood
content: For nearly two hours Rashif worked alone, hauling survivors on his shoulders, dragging the dead into lines by the roadside and loading the injured into his ambulance. He drove them a km down a fractured track to where reinforcements waited, returned, and went back in again.

title: Won't interfere with HC order junking plea on Maha polls validity: SC
content: The Supreme Court upheld the Bombay High Court's decision to dismiss a petition challenging the validity of the previous Maharashtra assembly elections based on alleged bogus voting. The High Court had rejected the plea due to a lack of evidence and the improper filing of a writ petition instead of an election petition.

title: Microsoft co-founder Bill Gates on the job he cannot do: I wouldn't enjoy being a ...
content: Bill Gates, during a mock interview with Stephen Curry, revealed his preference for product creation over sales and marketing roles. He admitted his lack of expertise in persuasion and emphasized his passion for defining and developing technology. Gates highlighted the importance of teamwork, acknowledging his need for partners skilled in marketing to complement his strengths.

title: 500mm in 84 hrs: 2 dead, 1 missing in Mumbai rain
content: Mumbai and surrounding areas faced severe disruption due to 500 mm of torrential rain over 84 hours, prompting a red alert and school closures. The heavy downpour led to two deaths, widespread flooding, and significant transportation delays, impacting rail, road, and air travel.

title: 'Entire country will ask for your affidavit': Rahul slams EC; calls SIR a new form of 'vote theft'
content: During his "Voter Adhikaar Yatra" in Gaya, Rahul Gandhi accused the Election Commission of vote manipulation and criticised their demand for an affidavit regarding his "vote chori" allegations. He warned election officials of potential action if an INDIA bloc government is formed, alleging irregularities in Bihar's SIR exercise and past elections in Maharashtra and Haryana.

title: Noah Lyles calls out Kishane Thompson: One-on-one race in Kingston; rivalry heats up
content: After Kishane Thompson's victory over Noah Lyles in Silesia, Lyles proposed a head-to-head rematch in Kingston, Jamaica, aiming to intensify their rivalry. Thompson responded with anticipation, promising "fireworks" in their upcoming races. Both sprinters are set to compete in Lausanne before heading to Tokyo, with their growing rivalry becoming a central narrative in track and field.

title: Microsoft's new return to office plan: Company requires 3-day office attendance
content: Microsoft will require employees near its Redmond headquarters to work in the office at least three days a week starting in January 2025, potentially leading to resignations. This shift reverses previous flexibility and aligns Microsoft with other tech giants mandating in-office attendance. Employees view the policy as a possible "stealth layoff" amid concerns about office space and resources, despite the company's strong financial performance.

title: PM Modi chairs economic meet; next-generation GST reforms discussed
content: Prime Minister Modi convened a high-level meeting to outline 'next-generation reforms,' including GST revisions, aiming to ease living and boost business. Following his Independence Day promise of a 'Diwali gift' of lighter taxes, the Centre proposed simplifying GST with two primary tax slabs.

title: 'Without any amendments': Hamas accepts new Gaza truce plan; hostages to be freed in batches
content: Hamas has accepted a new ceasefire proposal for Gaza without amendments, according to a source within the group, signaling a potential breakthrough in the conflict. Mediators from Egypt and Qatar, with US support, are working to finalize the agreement, which aims to secure a lasting truce and address the humanitarian crisis.

title: 6 cities in US with least work opportunities and earning potential
content: America‚Äôs cities reflect a widening economic divide. While hubs like Raleigh and Nashville flourish with innovation-driven growth, others‚Äîsuch as Bakersfield, Scranton, McAllen, Fresno, Memphis, and Jackson‚Äîstruggle with high unemployment, stagnant wages, and limited industry diversity. Checkr‚Äôs analysis, based on federal data, warns that without new investment and emerging sectors, these cities risk prolonged stagnation amid a growing national economy.

title: Mahomes: I didn‚Äôt believe Kelce at first about dating Taylor Swift
content: Patrick Mahomes initially doubted Travis Kelce's relationship with Taylor Swift, needing to witness it to believe it. He acknowledged the increased buzz and attention Swift brought to the stadium. Mahomes also praised Swift's dedication to her new album, revealed on Kelce's podcast, as both athletes focus on their comeback after a Super Bowl loss.

title: Ayesha Curry shares sweet clip of baby Cai ‚Äòwalking‚Äô like dad Steph
content: Ayesha Curry shared heartwarming moments on Instagram, showcasing baby Cai following in Stephen Curry's basketball footsteps. The post featured Cai enthusiastically dunking a ball, capturing the attention of fans. Amidst Stephen's Curry Camp, Ayesha keeps fans updated on their family life, including celebrating their 14th wedding anniversary with a touching message for her husband.

title: Canadiens goalie Samuel Montembeault marries longtime love in Montreal
content: Montreal Canadiens goaltender Samuel Montembeault and Daryanne Ayotte celebrated their wedding in Montreal after seven years of relationship. The ceremony was attended by family, friends, and Canadiens teammates, including Brendan Gallagher and Nick Suzuki. With the wedding concluding a busy offseason, the team now shifts focus to the upcoming rookie camp and the 2025-26 NHL season.

title: KBC 17: Can you guess the answer of Rs 50,00,000 question which contestant could not answer?
content: Sanjay Degama, a chemical technician from Gujarat, won ‚Çπ25,00,000 on Kaun Banega Crorepati 17. He impressed Amitabh Bachchan with his quick answers and shared his dream of buying a house for his family and fulfilling his wife's wish to see snow. He utilized lifelines strategically to navigate challenging questions, ultimately deciding to quit before the ‚Çπ50,00,000 question.

title: Matt Judon no longer entertains a free agent tag as the Miami Dolphins near a deall
content: The Miami Dolphins are eyeing veteran linebacker, free agent Matt Judon, a former Pro Bowler, to bolster their edge defense for the upcoming 2025 season. Judon, 33, coming off a less productive season with the Atlanta Falcons due to a devastating arm injury, is set to visit Miami this week.

title: Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes spent a whopping $150,000 but not on themselves
content: Patrick Mahomes and Brittany Mahomes, deeply committed to philanthropy, recently invested $150,000 in their foundation, 15 and the Mahomies. The foundation awarded $10,000 college scholarships to 15 deserving high school seniors from Kansas City, Tyler, and Lubbock, recognizing their academic achievements, leadership skills, and community involvement.

title: 'Differences must not become disputes': Jaishankar in talks with China FM Wang Yi ‚Äì Key points
content: Foreign Minister Wang Yi's visit to New Delhi marks a renewed effort to improve Sino-Indian relations. Wang's meeting with S Jaishankar and participation in border talks with Ajit Doval, follows agreements made between Modi and Xi in Kazan. China aims to build political trust, expand cooperation, and manage differences for stable bilateral ties.

title: Monalisa, Raju Kalakar, Ranu Mondal: Where are viral sensations who ruled social media
content: Viral fame can be fleeting, as seen with overnight sensations like Monalisa Bhonsle, Raju Kalakar, Bhuban Badyakar, Sahdev Dirdo, and Ranu Mondal. While a single viral clip catapulted them into the spotlight, sustaining a career proved challenging. Some, like Monalisa, are venturing into acting, while others, like Bhuban, faced legal hurdles.

title: India Asia Cup 2025 Squad: When will it be announced? Date, timing, venue confirmed
content: The BCCI is set to announce India's 15-member squad for the ACC Men‚Äôs Asia Cup 2025 on August 19, following a selection meeting in Mumbai. Suryakumar Yadav is expected to lead the team, with key T20 performers likely to be favored. Jasprit Bumrah returns, while India prepares for matches against UAE and Pakistan in the UAE-based tournament.

title: PM Modi meets Shubhanshu Shukla; astronaut shows Earth photos clicked from ISS
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi met astronaut Shubhanshu Shukla, celebrating his Axiom-4 mission to the ISS and India's growing space capabilities. Shukla shared pictures from space and received accolades in Parliament, though the Opposition's boycott drew criticism. India's space ambitions, including the Gaganyaan program and a planned space station, were highlighted, with the first module expected by 2028.

title: ‚ÄòSkibidi‚Äô, ‚Äòdelulu‚Äô & ‚Äòbroligarchy‚Äô among 6,000 new words added to Cambridge Dictionary
content: The Cambridge Dictionary has embraced internet culture by adding 6,000 new words, including TikTok slang like 'skibidi,' 'delulu,' and 'tradwife.' This update reflects how deeply online trends now shape modern English, prompting debate about language evolution. While some celebrate the recognition of digital slang, others criticize its impact on linguistic standards, highlighting the growing influence of internet-born terms.

title: Putin-Modi talks: Russian president dials PM; shares insights on Alaska meet with Trump
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi received a call from Russian President Vladimir Putin, who shared insights from his recent Alaska meeting with US President Donald Trump regarding a proposed peace deal. PM Modi reaffirmed India's consistent advocacy for a peaceful resolution to the Ukraine conflict and expressed support for all efforts aimed at achieving that goal.

title: Julian Sayin named Ohio State starter: Set for college debut; showdown vs Texas awaits
content: Julian Sayin, the redshirt freshman transfer from Alabama, has been named Ohio State's starting quarterback, succeeding in a close competition against Lincoln Kienholz. Coach Ryan Day announced the decision ahead of the highly anticipated season opener against No. 1 ranked Texas. Day emphasized Sayin's consistency, leadership, and smart decision-making as key factors in earning the role.

title: Braxton Berrios shines on field: Alix Earle steals spotlight in country outfit
content: Braxton Berrios, the Houston Texans' wide receiver, celebrated a Week 2 preseason victory against the Carolina Panthers, 20-3. Adding to the excitement, his girlfriend, social media influencer Alix Earle, was present to support him. Earle shared moments from the game, including a sweet sideline embrace with Berrios, on her Instagram. Her country-western outfit also grabbed attention.

title: Top 2 T20I run-scorers for both India and Pakistan won't be part of Asia Cup 2025 - here is why
content: The 2025 T20 Asia Cup will see India and Pakistan without key players. Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli have retired. Pakistan dropped Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan. Salman Ali Agha will lead Pakistan in a preparatory series. Pakistan faces India, UAE, and Oman in Group A. India's squad is still awaited. The Asia Cup concludes on September 28.

title: 'When confronted & destroyed!' Trump links Hamas' fate to hostage return
content: Donald Trump asserted that the release of hostages held by Hamas hinges on the group's confrontation and destruction. He emphasized his past achievements in securing hostage releases and resolving conflicts, highlighting his role in freeing hundreds of hostages and ending multiple wars. Trump urged decisive action, advocating for a strategy focused on victory.

title: Asia Cup: What‚Äôs India‚Äôs head-to-head record against Pakistan?
content: The 2025 Asia Cup, set in the UAE from September 9-28, will be in the T20 format, highlighted by the India vs Pakistan clash on September 14 in Dubai. This tournament serves as crucial preparation for the T20 World Cup 2026.

title: YSRCP backs CP Radhakrishnan: Jagan's party supports NDA nominee
content: The YSR Congress Party, with its 11 MPs, has pledged its support to NDA's vice-presidential candidate, C P Radhakrishnan, bolstering the ruling alliance's prospects. YSRCP MP Maddila Gurumoorthy confirmed the party's backing, even as the opposition gears up to nominate its own candidate. Defence Minister Rajnath Singh reportedly contacted YSR Congress chief Jagan Mohan Reddy to secure the endorsement.

title: Exports to US likely saw 7x faster growth vs overall rise
content: Indian exports to the US surged by 21% due to frontloading in anticipation of Trump's tariffs, overshadowing overall export growth. While exporters are offering discounts to retain business amidst uncertainty, concerns remain about sustaining operations if tariffs reach 50%. Industry leaders are seeking government support to mitigate potential job losses, particularly in the MSME sector.

title: 'Don‚Äôt make Vaibhav Suryavanshi wait': Team India's Asia Cup squad selection debate receives fresh twist
content: Kris Srikkanth, former India captain, has surprisingly advocated for 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi's inclusion in the Asia Cup T20 squad. Suryavanshi's impressive IPL 2025 performance and U19 tour of England have made him a strong contender. Srikkanth emphasizes Suryavanshi's maturity and shot-making ability, urging selectors to consider him for the upcoming T20 World Cup.

title: 'EC must first affirm voter list is clean, then we'll comply': INDIA bloc steps up attack
content: The INDIA bloc has criticised the Election Commission. Opposition leaders allege misconduct in recent elections. They question the special revision of electoral rolls in Bihar. Concerns were raised about voter list irregularities in Maharashtra and Karnataka. Trinamool Congress leader Mahua Moitra called for dissolving the Lok Sabha. The opposition demands accountability from the Election Commission.

title: Sophie Cunningham injury update: How the Indiana fever guard got injured
content: Sophie Cunningham sustained a right knee injury during a game against Connecticut Sun. The incident occurred in the second quarter. Cunningham's injury adds to the Fever's existing injury woes. An MRI is scheduled to determine the extent of the damage. Fans and teammates express their support. The team is awaiting the MRI results.

title: Govt. finding it tough to fill V-C posts
content: State-run universities are finding it difficult to fill up the Vice-Chancellor‚Äôs post owing to applications from ineligible persons, Higher Education Minister M.C. Sudhakar

title: Internal quota: Options being worked out to bring about consensus
content: Monday evening saw hectic parleys among Ministers and officials belonging to Scheduled Castes to arrive at a consensus on the internal reservation on the eve of the special Cabinet meeting, even as the Dalit left (Madigas) and the Dalit right (Holeyas) continued to exert pressure on the government

title: Same-sex couples demand recognition as ‚Äòspouses‚Äô in the IT Act to receive tax benefits
content: The petitioners argued that they should not be denied benefits under the law solely because their partnership is not heterosexual

title: Assembly plunges into pandemonium over Dharmasthala row
content: The Legislative Assembly plunged into pandemonium on Monday over the case of alleged mass burials in Dharmasthala, with the ruling and the Opposition members indulging in heated exchange of words

title: Activists, Opposition parties seek probe into West Bengal‚Äôs Deocha-Pachami coal project
content: They alleged financial irregularities, violation of tender agreement, and massive damage to the environment and local communities in connection with the project in Birbhum district

title: Back-to-back arrest of MSC vessels poses challenge to Vizhinjam port
content: The arrest of MSC vessels specifically at the Vizhinjam port sends a wrong signal to the world regarding the port, say port sources. This comes at a time when the port is already witnessing a decline in container discharge.

title: CPI(M) criticises Thirumavalavan for comments on conservancy workers
content: CPI(M) State secretary P. Shanmugam challenges Mr. Thirumavalavan‚Äôs position and urged him to clarify his stance

title: Has Economic Offences Wing of T.N. police ever solved a case within reasonable time, asks Madras High Court
content: Justice G. Jayachandran poses the question during hearing of a bail petition filed by Devanathan Yadav of Mylapore Hindu Permanent Fund Nidhi Limited

title: SC gives bail to former West Bengal Minister in cash-for-jobs scam
content: The court ordered former Minister Partha Chatterjee to be released only after the trial court completed the examination of material witnesses in the case within two months

title: Opposition meet to pick V-P candidate remains inconclusive
content: Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge would be reaching out to top Opposition leaders on phone to arrive at the widest possible consensus before announcing their pick on Tuesday

title: Jadavpur varsity alumnus accused of orchestrating attack on WB Minister‚Äôs convoy gets bail
content: On August 15, the researcher was produced before a court in Kolkata, where the chief police prosecutor drew parallels between the attack on the American Centre in Kolkata in 2002 and the attack on the minister‚Äôs¬†car, saying that the accused need not be present to plot an attack

title: Uttar Pradesh man dies in explosion in West Bengal‚Äôs Madhyamgram area, NIA visits spot
content: The victim was reportedly caught on CCTV walking with a bag, which exploded and maimed him on the spot¬†

title: Government survey shows dip in unemployment rate
content: The Labour Bureau found that the unemployment rate in the country has come down by 0.4 percentile points to 5.2% in July from 5.6% in June

title: Rajnath gets YSRCP to back NDA‚Äôs V-P candidate
content: Rajnath reaches out to non-NDA parties such as the DMK, YSRCP and BJD; DMK unlikely to support NDA pick; Radhakrishnan expected to file his nominations for the election on August 20

title: Rain wreaks havoc in Maharashtra, brings Mumbai to a standstill
content: Four lakh hectares of cropland destroyed; 177 mm rain was reported within six hours in Mumbai; several flights were diverted, schools shut, buses rerouted, and local trains delayed

title: W.B. CM announces scheme for migrant workers facing harassment in other States
content: Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee says about 10,000 people have returned to the State in the past few months after being targeted in different States

title: Country will ask for affidavit from Election Commission of India: Rahul Gandhi
content: Rahul Gandhi, who urged the people of Bihar to prevent vote theft in the upcoming Assembly election and teach the poll body and the Prime Minister a ‚Äúlesson‚Äù, says that once the INDIA bloc forms the government at the Centre, it will take ‚Äústrict action‚Äù against CEC Gyanesh Kumar

title: Property documents, digital devices seized during ED searches on premises linked to Minister I. Periyasamy
content: The Directorate of Enforcement says the search team also found certain ‚Äòpaper companies‚Äô being operated from the premises of Irulappa Mills, in which Mr. Periyasamy and his younger son P. Prabhu are directors. The accounts of these companies are being verified

title: Offence of sexually assaulting a minor can be alleged even against a woman, rules Karnataka High Court
content: It refuses to quash a criminal case against a woman for allegedly compelling a 13-year-old boy to have sex with her

title: Minister promises thorough inquiry into maternal, infant deaths in Belagavi hospital
content: Sharan Prakash Patil was responding to a query by Congress member M. Nagaraj in the Legislative Council

title: Lokesh meets five Union Ministers, seeks speedy clearances for A.P. projects¬†
content: He urges External Affairs Minister to help Andhra Pradesh in forging collaborations with Singapore and other countries; requests Nitin Gadkari‚Äôs nod for laying of a 56-km-long greenfield highway connecting Kuppam, Hosur and Bengaluru

title: Madras High Court refuses interim relief in TVK flag dispute case
content: Justice Senthilkumar Ramamoorthy rejects an application filed by a trust seeking an interim injunction against the party and its leader C. Joseph Vijay

title: IISc team‚Äôs new findings may have therapeutic implications in treating diabetes
content: The study shows how entry of glucose into the cell to kickstart insulin release falters in Type 2 diabetes and how restoring it could open new therapeutic avenues

title: Spillway discharge of flood at Sriramsagar begins with heavy inflows since Aug. 15
content: Release of water from the projects to FFC taken up to fill MMD, LMD, online reservoirs of Kaleshwaram project

title: Bihar SIR: Any person missing from draft rolls may file a claim with copy of Aadhaar, says Election Commission
content: In light of the INDIA bloc‚Äôs criticism of the ECI‚Äôs conduct, the Bihar CEO‚Äôs notice says ‚Äòall such electors, whose names are not included in the draft roll, may obtain information about their entry and the reasons thereof by using their EPIC number in the published list‚Äô

title: In Bargarh rally, BJD reconnects with its base among farmers¬†
content: The regional party has alleged the incumbent BJP-led State government created difficulties for farmers with complex rules to register for paddy procurement

title: Kerala govt. amends controversial order on HSS Principals
content: The order, which required higher secondary Principals to do the job of clerks, amended in the wake of complaints. Teachers point out that they have to work even after school hours to complete their responsibilities

title: Bars pegged at 840, timings extended till midnight under new policy in A.P.
content: Additional 10% licences for toddy tappers, allotment to be made through draw of lots for a three-year term beginning Sept. 1; no permission at religious places, barred along routes leading to Alipiri and Tirumala

title: Shubhanshu Shukla meets PM Modi; gifts tri-colour that travelled to space
content: Shubhanshu Shukla gifted the Prime Minister the mission patch of the Axiom-4 mission and the Indian tricolour that he had taken with him to the ISS

title: PM Modi chairs high-level meet on next-gen reforms
content: Union Ministers Rajnath Singh, Amit Shah, Nitin Gadkari, Nirmala Sitharaman, Shivraj Singh Chouhan, Piyush Goyal and Lalan Singh attended the meeting

title: Police deploy drones to monitor rain and flood situation in Eluru
content: Police say as the neighbouring Telangana is receiving heavy rains in the upstream villages, flood levels in Kolleru Lake have seen a rise leading to roads being submerged and many villages cut off

title: Nine proposals, including Gold Cluster in Mangalagiri, get CRDA nod
content: ‚Çπ904 crore sanctioned for infrastructure works in 29 capital region villages; projects should reflect iconic designs and international standards, says CM

title: Godavari flood: 198 fisherfolk families evacuated
content: The edges of the three islands abutting Havelock Bridge were washed away in the Godavari flood in 2022; Heavy inflows into the Godavari downstream of the Polavaram irrigation project Many villages cut-off as Godavari, Sabari in spate on AP-Chhattisgarh border.

title: Nellore school headmaster‚Äôs passion for photography grabs him global accolades
content: K. Surya Prakasa Rao has received 68 gold medals and 130 recognitions in the fine-art photography during the last couple of years

title: Dharmasthala case: Home Minister warns of action against those posting provocative and defamatory content on social media
content: The Home Minister‚Äôs warning comes as a response to the Opposition MLAs‚Äô demand to act against You Tubers whom they accused of indulging in a smear campaign

title: Relevant, credible news media commands value: Sridhar Arnala
content: The Hindu Sales and Distribution vice-president shared his insights on media and business during an interactive session with students of  PVP Siddhartha Institute of Technology

title: YSRCP leader slams NDA govt. over Amaravati floods, land pooling
content: Ambati Rambabu alleges media suppression to hide capital‚Äôs flooding; accuses Chandrababu Naidu of betraying farmers by seeking more land despite stalled development

title: Heavy rains in Kodagu: Discharge from KRS stepped up
content: Authorities have advised people living in low-lying areas to shift to safer places along with their cattle

title: Naidu calls upon TDP leaders to thwart YSRCP‚Äôs ‚Äòvicious campaign‚Äô
content: NDA govt. managed to fulfil its electoral promises in spite of constraints in the last one year but the YSRCP is trying all the tricks to show the govt. in poor light, says Naidu

title: Now, raise a cybercrime complaint with a click and QR code scan
content: But citizens will have to go to the station to register a formal complaint with supporting documents

title: HC orders notice to State govt. on petition over appointment of MLA as KKRDB chief
content: Seeking a CBI probe, petitioner says there has been misappropriation of funds, including those from the Central govt., allotted to the board

title: Kerala‚Äôs Okkal Seed Farm bags carbon-neutral tag
content: The farm emitted 221.67 tonnes of carbon dioxide equivalent in 2024, according to a study. These emissions were fully offset through a UNFCCC-registered project, earning the farm its carbon-neutral status

title: Parliamentary proceedings: Guwahati to get new IIM
content: The Centre has proposed a Bill to establish an Indian Institute of Management in Guwahati; the institute will get a corpus fund of ‚Çπ555 crore for the first five years

title: Literary festival dedicates a day to children
content: The event, which had sessions on inclusivity, science, and literature, termed a milestone. Children were delivered one message primarily ‚Äî read, read, read.

title: Draft Guide: Rankings, mock drafts and analysis
content: this draft guide will serve as one-stop shop for all of our best fantasy football picks possible in every draft you're in . we have everything needed to help you draft a great team and start the season with a shot . it doesn't matter whether you have been doing this for years or are a first-timer .

title: Preseason Week 2 takeaways: Caleb Williams looks sharp in preseason debut
content: the second week of the 2025 preseason kicked off on friday . the Bears didn't let a bungled kickoff return that buried them at the 8-yard line on their first drive or a holding penalty derail momentum .

title: Everything to know about the revamped -- and controversial -- US Open mixed doubles
content: the mixed doubles event runs concurrently with the main draw and the championship match is held during the final weekend . but this edition will be condensed into two days during qualifying week . the tournament also features an unprecedented number of top-ranked singles players .

title: It‚Äôs finally time! Where is your team in our preseason Power Rankings?
content: the 2025 season is just around the corner, so it's time to reevaluate the outlooks for all 32 teams . our power panel of more than 30 writers and editors evaluate how NFL teams stack up against each other . check out how holdouts, breakouts and injuries have impacted our rankings .

title: What Bengals' Trey Hendrickson, Commanders' Terry McLaurin are missing as season nears
content: two teams with super bowl aspirations share a less savory commonality . each has a top player who has been holding-in while trying to secure a contract extension . both veterans are angling for new contracts .

title: UFC 319 Fight Grades: Did two spinning back elbow finishes save the card?
content: a middleweight title fight between the unstoppable force and the immovable object ( Dricus Du Plessis) headlined the UFC's return to Chicago on Saturday . the main card was left to do the heavy lifting in the highlight department . two fighters -- Prates and Lerone Murphy -- will find themselves in the conversation for 2025 knockout of the year .

title: NFL preseason trade tracker: Every move leading up to the 2025 season
content: the NFL preseason has arrived, with all 32 teams navigating their training camps and prepping for the 2025 season . as teams continue to tinker with their final rosters, we are tracking every trade before the season kicks off on sept. 4 . the latest moves came Sunday, with the Eagles sending tight end Harrison Bryant to Houston for wide receiver John Metchie III .

title: ‚õ≥ Augusta National ditches masses for revenue
content: the 2026 "Official Masters Hospitality" program includes offers of housing, transportation, catering and so on to the corporate and/or well-heeled . the "Full Scale, Private Home Program," which will run you a mere $219,600 for the week, comes days after the announcement that a local restaurant is closing .

title: ‚öæ MLB awards: Sanchez, Skenes for NL Cy Young?
content: this month's awards watch reflects changes atop some races and separation in others . the two methods of tracking these things are in complete accord when it comes to anointing the current favorites . a lot can and will change in short period of time in a big league baseball season .
